Visit our new merchandise shop at [http://shop.maker.tv/collections/kerbal-space-program/products/kerbal-space-tee-plush-bundle](**MAKER STUDIOS** for more information.
Nice, may make a good B-Day present for KSP fans.

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Finally! I can now make my very own Jebediah voodoo doll. [cue maniacal laughter]

Edit: Thanks! (And ordered.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T21:56:05Z" title="04/29/2015 09:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Cydonian Monk**

HOLY FLIP! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

uncapsplz

I saw this through my exploration of the new website, I am a bit disappointed that we don't have a picture of what it looks like. Though I suppose neither does Squad.

I will definitely be getting one.
I want one now....
YES! tenchar
Yay! A nice replacement for the Cafe Press shirts, thought I wish it had the KSP logo somewhere.
future zero-g indicator in the soyuz ? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> future zero-g indicator in the soyuz ? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Dragon? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Ordered and thank you....
Them 1.0 business deals coming to fruition. Now, I'd like a Val plushie please.

Oh man, wasn't expecting this. But errhh... it looks to me like Kerbin is rendered backwards on that shirt, I think. Hard to to tell without seeing the continent KSC is on, but something seems off about it.

> 
> Oh man, wasn't expecting this. But errhh... it looks to me like Kerbin is rendered backwards on that shirt, I think. Hard to to tell without seeing the continent KSC is on, but something seems off about it.

It is. The Desert Peninsula isn't facing the east. As far as I can tell... But I don't mind. Although... the elongated Kerbal head is weird to me...
Awesome definitely getting some :-)

> 
> Oh man, wasn't expecting this. But errhh... it looks to me like Kerbin is rendered backwards on that shirt, I think. Hard to to tell without seeing the continent KSC is on, but something seems off about it.

I've got the game up, it is backwards

Uhhhh the Kerbin on the tee is reversed. The asteroid crater is on the Western side of the far continent.

I can tell it's not upside down because that peninsula at the top is in the North.

[http://www.kerbalmaps.com/](Compare)

EDIT: Super-ninja'd, but hey I at least showed my work ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Although... the elongated Kerbal head is weird to me...

I think that's just the fold of the shirt in the image. It's the Bob Kerman at Duna steam trading card, which looks fine.
Plushies? I can't say I've heard that term before. That sounds American to me. Is it a stuffed child's toy like a teddy bear or something?
I show it to my wife... Now we just order 2...

> 
> future zero-g indicator in the soyuz ? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Pretty much.

Jebby bear works as well I suppose.
Will there be a Valentina version? She seems just as cuddlable as Jeb!
